outputs.output_descr: To support the definition and delegation of economic development responsibilities for the target local government unit/s and to provide direct funding of local economic actions.
outputs.output_title: Support to LED in the oPt

outputs.output_descr: Support to increasing own-source revenues in the Local Governance System in the occupied Palestinian territory

project_descr: This Programme aims at contributing to the development of a democratic, decentralized, transparent and inclusive system of Local Governance in the oPt that is more responsive and capable of delivering quality services to local communities.
